story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: PT Bhavendra Legal Konsultan was founded in 2024 by a group of experienced lawyers with a vision to provide affordable, high-quality legal services for small and medium businesses in Indonesia.
story.paragraph2: The name "Bhavendra" comes from Sanskrit meaning "King of Truth", reflecting our commitment to uphold truth and integrity in every aspect of our legal practice.
story.paragraph3: Although newly established, we have a team of experienced lawyers and legal consultants dedicated to providing the best legal solutions for our clients.
